website_summaries.verdict: A good all-around, lightweight wheelchair, but a little wide for some doorways.
pros: Quick-folding for transport, with removable leg cushions
cons: Front legs angle out a bit, making it tough to negotiate tight spaces
Plastic foot rests may break easily

customer_reviews.title: rubber on wheels falls off!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this! We purchased for our elderly mother. The rubber fell off one wheel during transport a few weeks after purchasing. The aides at her assisted living facility were able to eventually position back on. Now both wheels have lost the rubber again, they cannot fix it, and the 30 day returns window to Amazon has expired! Repeat - Do not buy this!!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great price. The reason I did not give a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great price. The reason I did not give a five star. Is the foot rest is plastic and breaks easy. When it breaks you can fix the foot pad with J.B. weld. Here is another way to fix the problem change the foot plates. from Walmart.com $35.00 Drive Medical Chrome Swing Away Footrests with Aluminum Footplates
customer_reviews.author: D  L

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: It was lightweight when lifting it in and out of car. It was very cheaply made and even though the tag said it had a lifetime time warranty that did not include issues with leg rests and wheels. That was apparently 3months. I bought it for my husband who did not come home for a few months after I ordered it. It was already out of warranty before he had a chance to use it. Leg rest stuck in extension and left small wheel sticks
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: came quickly and was mostly assembled. just needed to put the foot and leg rests on and adjust for proper length. this is a very well designed wheelchair. I will be using it for air travel. the foot rests come off so easily that I plan to carry them aboard so they don't get lost when the chair is stowed in cargo area. amazingly affordable. I'll also be using it on accessible trails. a swifter duster cleans up the wheels nicely. the armrests are completely removable or you can flip them up.
customer_reviews.author: Clodagh

customer_reviews.title: THANKFUL!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Spine degeneration disease and can't do much walking and standing for long. And haven't been able to get out much. This will for sure help me get back to living out and about again. Seems well made and sturdy, I bought a gel cushion and a cup holder and can't wait to use it more... I definitely recommend getting extra seat padding for it. Great price for what I need it for... Keep in mind it is a bit heavy... I also have really bad weakness in my hands and this is easy for me to use alone...
customer_reviews.author: Cuttillgirl

customer_reviews.title: Using it for a week, so far so good...
customer_reviews.text: The chair arrived Monday 20 July while I was at work...I got to use it Tues-Friday keeping with Dr restrictions on how much to sit/stand using crutches and this chair. It seems to be handling my weight well so far and time will tell how long it will last (compared to other reviews) but I am losing weight so I hope that helps longevity for the product and myself. I don't like the composite feet rests it came with and found a pair of Aluminum feet rests from another brand that are supposed to work (and will update tomorrow when I try them out for the first time).
customer_reviews.author: Jeff P

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: We received and adjusted my new wheelchair today. The quality and fit are as described and certainly of high quality. The alignment where the seat goes into the frame is off by about 1 1/2 inch so one must be careful when siting to make sure the seat bottom goes into the plastic receptacle. The packaging should have been better and it is fortunate that nothing was damaged in shipment. Pictures of the damage to the inner and outer container are attached. I would recommend having the Amazon box be used as if it were a gift to get the extra protection! The product would have receive 5 stars if there was not so much damage to the container!
customer_reviews.author: Ian G

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for big people, I'm 6 ft. 1" and weigh 265 lbs. I use it to get around my house, it maneuvers very well. I'm glad for the price $153 very reasonable. If your going to be in it a lot you might want to get a cushion and a cup holder. No Issues, great for a broken leg.
customer_reviews.author: weed wacker

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Value
customer_reviews.text: Great wheelchair. Elevating leg rests are wonderful. They do tend to stick out a little far even when folded down but it is worth it. If you need to remove them, it takes less than 5 seconds. Handles on each side of seat make it very easy to fold. Not the lightest weight but still lighter than others. It is a great value for the cost. PS - If you will do much long term sitting in it, I do recommend the seat cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great wheel chair but still heavy
customer_reviews.text: It is highly maneuverable, stable, and comfortable. However, I am small and, for me, it is difficult to load in the back of my SUV since I have to lift it so high - both heavy for me and large. I think it would be easier if I didn't have to get my arms around the two wheels otherwise the chair starts to open up. Maybe I'll try attaching a bungee across the two wheels to keep them together as I'm lifting the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Wooby

customer_reviews.title: Quick evaluation
customer_reviews.text: 12/21/2019 Bought this wheelchair for my mom as a Christmas gift. She doesn't know it yet. She has neuropathy in her feet and denies/won't accept how bad of a condition She is in. Upon my own first impressions when briefly testing it out, I like it. Drives smoothly. I sit in it comfortably and I am 5'6 225 lbs. Easy to fold with the handles on sit. Leg rests attach very easily. A little weird to have the back for the calf support but I also never experienced such a thing. Can't wait for my mom to see it and try it out during our adventures. Will update later on.
customer_reviews.author: awilli20

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: This wheelchair is just what we needed. It is very sturdy. The chair doesn’t move when the brakes are on making it easy for for someone in the chair to stand without the chair moving away. The only concerns are the weight and the seat. The weight was a little more than I anticipated although it’s still manageable. The seat has very little cushioning so we bought a cushion to fix that problem. We still are happy with the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Tarbell

customer_reviews.title: GOOD CHAIR FOR A GOOD PRICE
customer_reviews.text: Use the chair for my husband to get around the house. I haven't had it long enough to talk about durability but it glides across carpet . The seat is a true 22 inches and is comfortable for him and the leg extensions are easy to adjust with the holes so that a tool isn't necessary. I like this chair so far and would recommend it for a great chair for easy transportation.
customer_reviews.author: denise hodnett

customer_reviews.title: A good fit.
customer_reviews.text: Being short I needed a wheelchair that was adjustable in height . Not all are. The nylon seat is more comfortable than a vinyl one and the 20 inch seat width gives added comfort. The full length arm rests are great not just for resting your arms but for added ease when getting in and out of the chair. They also flip-up out of the way for sitting at a table. The leg rests are adjustable and easy to swing out of the way if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Lanore

customer_reviews.title: Feet plate hard to attach
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time attaching the feet plates. YouTube had an amazing video which explained how to do that. There were no instructions sent with the wheelchair. I love the actual wheelchair. It is heavy duty and will work well for us. The weight is a little much for me. But it will hold my husband when I need it to. It is a little difficult to fold, but I think it might get easier with use. I would recommend this product to anyone who needs to move a large person around. The wheel base is a little wide for small doorways. The delivery was faster than they expected, which was perfect for us. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Cooley Tax & Accounting Service

customer_reviews.title: good buy but the foot rests broke off
customer_reviews.text: We bought this wheel chair for a three day trip to Disneyland. It did the job; it was light enough that it was easily pushed even carrying a 300 lb man. My one complaint is that the foot rests are plastic and not string enough. They broke on the first day. WE have since ordered new metal ones that work well.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Crossman

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight wheelchair
customer_reviews.text: We bought this wheelchair for my daughter who has Down syndrome and takes a long time walking places. We use it for doctor appointments and outings where a lot of walking is done. This is our third wheelchair and I love it. I'm not a very big person and I've had to heft around other wheelchairs. This one is so much lighter and easier to maneuver in and out of our vehicle. We are very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B.

customer_reviews.title: good wheelchair. just got it. piece of leg broken
customer_reviews.text: just got it. walking around house with it seems fine other than piece of leg is broken off. not sure how to remedy that situation. don't want to have to return the entire thing for the right leg. the first pic shows how it looks. second are the pieces. third is left and what it should look like. any advice?
customer_reviews.author: Fingers1970

customer_reviews.title: Good value for entry level wheelchair
customer_reviews.text: The wheelchair is very user friendly, comes pretty much ready to use out of the box and it is fairly light. I like that it opens very easily, haven't really played with it much. It's probably a better fit for indoor use due to the wheels. The material seems to be hard plastic vs. rubber. Unsure at this point if it will hold however we did not purchase this for heavy use so should be fine. If that's your case too probably a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made... But arm rests could be thicker for long term use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for a few months after ankle surgery. It appears to be well made... But I noticed the arm rest pads are a bit thin after sitting in the chair for a few hours watching a movie. But maybe that's just me. Overall though I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: C+V Blouir

customer_reviews.title: ... first wheelchair was a Drive and I was very happy with it then I needed another chair and bought ...
customer_reviews.text: My first wheelchair was a Drive and I was very happy with it then I needed another chair and bought Invacare very good. I have come to the point where I can't manuever my invacare into my van too heavy so 36# and having owned a Drive before I bought this and It was very easy for me to get into my van by myself My husband can't help me so this is nice and I am a big woman but this is ample and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: pam

customer_reviews.title: Wheel broke after only fourth time using it.
customer_reviews.text: I normally use a motorized wheelchair, but I purchased this wheelchair in im traveling by car as my motorized wheelchair is extremely heavy and bulky to load into a care. After using this Drive manual wheelchair for only the fourth time, three mag spokes snapped from the center (see picture). I weigh about 210 pounds, and the wheelchair supposed to have a 350-pound limit.
customer_reviews.author: GERALD L MARCLEY

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: After a septic infection and losing the left knee and bone infection I was having to lease and rent heavy damage wheelchairs at the hospital for pt appointments and follow ups causing waste of time and inconvenience. The wheelchair overall is in good condition we haven’t tested out in public outings yet but it’s well made heavy metal in the main frame the seat and back rest are very comfortable and easy to put in the leg rest . I’ll update when we tested it out when having appointments. So far happy beats leasing one for $86.00 a week or borrowing a damaged one from a hospital. Thank you 💐😊
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: sturdy wheel chair
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband. Chair is sturdy and easy to move around. Fits through most doors. I wouldn't call it light-weight, I cannot lift it to put in th back of the car, but my daughter-in-law has no problem, so by comparison it may be. Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: HMc

customer_reviews.title: Super lightweight wheelchair sturdy enough to hold a 300 lb patient.
customer_reviews.text: My husband broke his knee. He is a big man. I needed something sturdy to get him around because my hundred pound butt wasn't going to be much help without some sort of help. This wheelchair is light enough for me to be able to fold it up and load it in my van to get the hubby around. I love the adjustability of just about every part of this chair. I recommend it to anyone in need on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Shorty J

customer_reviews.title: Uncle Complained Forever, Now He Loves It
customer_reviews.text: My uncle complained forever about how he "didn't need a wheelchair". Now we take it everywhere we go. It's easy to fold and fit in the back of the van, and it's comfortable enough for short trips. It is a little bit heavy, but so is my uncle.
customer_reviews.author: KSo

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: My wife broke her hip and needs a wheelchair for a while. I researched a number of wheelchairs and decided to purchase this one. I am glad that I did. It is easy to assemble and is very sturdy. I would suggest this wheelchair to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: MarioD

customer_reviews.title: A good job for the short term
customer_reviews.text: Only planning on being in the wheelchair until my knee replacement surgery. This chair fills the bill. At times, the right wheel will just spin when I attempt to move it but other than that it’s an OK chair for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Marla Burton

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: We bought this chair because my spouse was having foot surgery. Very sturdy, rolls easily, made well and comfortable. Easy to assemble and transport. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion, this chair could be more sturdy. I am not near the weight recommendation, yet the chair wobbles and shakes, which makes the chair harder to maneuver at times.
customer_reviews.author: Rhea

customer_reviews.title: Wheelchair
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my knee surgery and when I am too much in pain to walk. First one we got was smaller and had no leg supports which we needed to have for the knee surgery. bigger seat and really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice construction. Works well
customer_reviews.text: Very nice construction. Works well. To be used for getting out more. My sister (co-caregiver) felt is too heavy for her to tote around (put in trunk). I feel is works fine. Might want to consider all folks that will need to handle, maybe find a lighter unit if some users have difficulty lifting.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Gladstone

customer_reviews.title: The cost
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my mother, she's in the late-stage of Alzheimer's disease. The wheelchair moves around great on carpet. It's a good investment, I could have gotten a chair through Medicare for free, but it would have taken months to arrive. nonetheless, the price was right and it took less than a week to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Avis Terry-Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: When I broke my leg and foot I couldn't use crutches. I almost fell 2x. This chair made me mobile again. Easy to maneuver and fit through most doorways.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2Lilli

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: This is my transportation. I was able to sit in it comfortably with leg elevated. Easy for some one to push or maneuver it myself. Took it for a spin around the park and ride was pleasant on paved surfaces. The side panels are not as solid as I'd like but reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Big Girls Can Carry

customer_reviews.title: Easy to move from house to car. Easy to fold and load into the trunk.
customer_reviews.text: This wheechair has been put to the test every day for 2 months. It's wide enough for comfort, but can still get through 32" interior doorways easily. It's easy to get the patient into the car and fold the chair for storage in transit.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Good wheelchair
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my grandma. She Likes it, but the actual seat is a little bit larger then we thought, good value though
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for plus size too!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this wheelchair. I had knee surgery, and wanted something simple and lightweight. But I'm also a larger woman, so I wanted comfortable and stable. This chair totally meets all my needs. I would recommend this style to anyone wondering what in the world to get!!
customer_reviews.author: Kari Fuhrman

customer_reviews.title: general
customer_reviews.text: with the foot/leg in certain positions the wheels can't be locked/unlocked. The calf support is too narrow to support a broken leg/ankle/foot. I have to tie the leg to the chair to keep it from falling off and hitting the floor. It needs a lot of improvements overall. Basically if you have leg to foot issues this one isn't for you.
customer_reviews.author: Tommie M.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good choicel
customer_reviews.text: Nothing! Screws on the inside rail hurts's and scratch me. The wheels are hard to roll. It is very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Craig

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Fold And Comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.text: This wheelchair is extremely easy to fold, comfortable for my 81 year old Mom ( she also uses a cushion ) and has a attractive design.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta  Natowitz

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this purchase as I read some reviews. I'm satisfied with my decision to buy this wheelchair. Thank you manufacturers.
customer_reviews.author: Lirpa Harper

customer_reviews.title: Upset customer
customer_reviews.text: Not a happy customer. This is the 3rd wheelchair from Drive in which all I’ve had are problems but my FSA account only let me get this item. The part that hold the leg rest up are ready to fall off. The seat area is ripping and where you put your elbows on it bent. This is very unsafe for my husband. I chatted with customer service at Drive medical and someone was suppose to call back but never got a call.
customer_reviews.author: MARIA MARTINEZ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair for my elderly dad. we love everything about it and i love that its really easy for me to pick up and put into my car. super light but yet very sturdy and it pushes smoothly! My dad is about 5 foot 10 and probably pushing about 270 pounds and it fits him comfortably. I would recommend this chair.
customer_reviews.author: tammie

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love my wheelchair, will be temporary till I can walk again
customer_reviews.author: sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Nice cruiser
customer_reviews.text: We were able to use it for when my mother in law needed help getting around at a family picnic. It is lightweight and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: BeeHappy

customer_reviews.title: Good chair
customer_reviews.text: I have hip surgery coming up and I’m like how easy it is to get in and out of wheelchair. Glad I ordered the padded seat. It really helps
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Brault

customer_reviews.title: chair great / restock fee
customer_reviews.text: Had to return this one.. seat was too big. Reordered but had to pay a $40 restock
customer_reviews.author: tk

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: We needed this for my Mom in law.. it was exactly as described...easy to push, easy to fold. Comfortable for Mom, great price !! Was delivered sooner than expected 🙂
customer_reviews.author: sly3226

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Moves easily. Light enough but hard to get excited about it. Its Okay.
customer_reviews.author: B+P

customer_reviews.title: Really Great Wheelchair!
customer_reviews.text: Not as "Light weight" As I expected, But other than that, It is an awesome wheelchair for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the cost and working perfectly for my needs. The lock of the wheels is a tad flimsy ... but I just roll my back against something and lock the wheels for safety. Never even had a close call to falling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!!
customer_reviews.text: Like a Cadillac at a lower Cost for wheelchairs! Comfy, lighter than older models similar sizes and smooth rolling! Excellent Seller and Fast Shipping carefully packaged!!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: I can't say enough good about this chair
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good about this chair. We bought it because it was relatively light weight. Fabulous - it makes a real difference in loading it in and out of a vehicle. More than this, though - the chair moves easily, is very maneuverable and yet tough. So glad we bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Parker

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Great wheels for a big feller like myself. Light enough for my kids to put it in the trunk. Great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well for me.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for my needs for temporary disability after back surgery. I dont really use the leg rests like I thought I would. I would also recommend a seat cushion if you will be sitting for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Terra Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: WHEELCHAIR GOOD. THE LEG REST MISSING. MY OLD ONES FROM ANOTHER CHAIR FIT.
customer_reviews.author: pp

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this chair. The wheels are balanced nicely and it rolls smoothly. Its very lightweight and easy to put together initially. Folds up easily and fits into any car trunk with ease. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Walushis

customer_reviews.title: High Quaility at a Low Price.
customer_reviews.text: Unexpected high quality. Wheelchairs used to cost hundreds of dollars. I paid 150.00. Well worth it. It's strong and durable. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: G. Coniglio

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT, GREAT VALUE!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to set up-my neice did it. Easy to fold and transport, holding up nicely. Best of all, SO EASY TO WHEEL YOURSELF! Excellent dynamics-Im a chubbs but have no difficulty.Thanks for making a great, affordable product!
customer_reviews.author: marienicole2

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight wheelchair
customer_reviews.text: Product was as described. It was delivered very quickly. But I had difficulties with USPS the carrier kept complaining it was too heavy. Of course it was double box in about 50 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Marcie Greear

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my mom - she has been using it daily for 2 months plus and likes it. This is definitely a very good buy. Adding the leg rest and getting it to align equally is not as easy.
customer_reviews.author: Buchi

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, and Light weight
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, and Light weight. Only issue I have is the handles don't fold down making it harder to put in my cargo area in a tight fashion.
customer_reviews.author: A Pirate Family

customer_reviews.title: Received it 2 times damaged.
customer_reviews.text: First time I received it, the arm piece latch is broken and box damaged. The second time I received it, the bottom piece plastic of the right leg is chipped.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how well this was made and easy to handle. It is very sturdy and you cant beat the price. Excellent product
customer_reviews.author: Holly L Knight

customer_reviews.title: Bad Design
customer_reviews.text: The chair would not unfold into the seat brackets that lock the chair into the open position. Not a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Dan Dowd

customer_reviews.title: Very good chair
customer_reviews.text: The chair came assembled only had to put foot rests on .It is very easy to use .
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I love that is very light weight, easy to fold and very comfortable for the person using it. Also the fact that it’s not too wide when going thru door exits.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Did the job
customer_reviews.text: Used it for my wife when she broke her hip.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great wheelchair.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter broke her foot and this was our choice of ‘transportation’
customer_reviews.author: MMurphy

customer_reviews.title: all around nice unit
customer_reviews.text: Easy to maneuver. Easy to fold up and put into our cars (both Tucson and Prius). Comfortable - when my wife started back to work from home she was able to do her half days in the chair with no discomfort. Leg rests were very good.
customer_reviews.author: Tim C

customer_reviews.title: A good buy.
customer_reviews.text: A great chair for the money. Similar ones cost hundreds in a home-health supply store.
customer_reviews.author: LGPHX

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable chair
customer_reviews.text: Easy to sit in, rolls around well. Leg rests are sturdy and easy to adjust or remove.
customer_reviews.author: jed

customer_reviews.title: But overall good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Padding on the chair needs a little improvement. For some reason chair scoots inspire of being locked in. Would not buy again. Stick with invacare.
customer_reviews.author: Mona lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and my best companion while recovering from a knee surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Sonera

customer_reviews.title: Gina give me lots more freedom
customer_reviews.text: I love this . It's alot heavier than stated. But it moves awesome. Leg rest are so comfortable. Best thing is there's noi fixing anything add leg tests and go which lol go on super easily
customer_reviews.author: Annamaria T.

customer_reviews.title: Breaks Easily
customer_reviews.text: Only used the chair three times before the leg adjustments broke.
customer_reviews.author: angie deeds

customer_reviews.title: One of the best
customer_reviews.text: Light weight even my wife could load it. Durable, large enough to handle my size. easy to use at the office. One of the best chairs I've seen or used.
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Marc Baisden

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for vacation after reviewing prices for rentals. This chair came assembled, only had to attach the leg/foot rests. Very pleased with quality as chair is very sturdy, comfortable and easy to fold and maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Will last a long time & comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Nice chair. I just didn't understand how to attach the leg/foot rests. Had to watch a u tube video then it was simple. But why no "real" instructions? Chair is good quality though. I also bought a padded seat cushion, a must.
customer_reviews.author: kathy whitmer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the price! Very easy to roll. Love that sides drop down for transferring and the seat height can be adjusted easily.
customer_reviews.author: melody l blanchard

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy but lightweight wheelchair.
customer_reviews.text: For the price this has been a great wheel chair. It was an “open box” item but it seemed like brand new to me!
customer_reviews.author: ASadler

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to lift.
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy for me to put in the SUV and take it out. The weight was light enough for me. I wanted something that I could handle by myself and not have to have someone along. I can now go do almost anything by myself. That is very special for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A Wollersheim

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I saved a ton vs renting one from the hospital, and now I have it for friends or family to use
customer_reviews.author: Dan Russell

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: It has been used a few times. We wish it was lighter, but it is wonderful. My daughter said that it is comfortable and it feels sturdy. It was a good purchase
customer_reviews.author: M. Pron

customer_reviews.title: Not portable, but good quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality is good, but very heavy (not light as expected). I can hardly lift it in or out of the trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: A little large ... must always remember to empty the trunk of everything before we head out.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa W

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and well made
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to operate. However does not have seatbelt. Ask for one
customer_reviews.author: Douglas McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Great power steering!
customer_reviews.text: Pivots on a dime. Super light to lift. A wheel base is a little wider than most chairs this size, so double check and measure your doorways.
customer_reviews.author: Melky Aleman

customer_reviews.title: Need parts
customer_reviews.text: I am missing the leg braces for both sides please help.maria robles 2147735553
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Robles

customer_reviews.title: Great product has a tendency to wander right
customer_reviews.text: Great product has a tendency to wander right, the arm doesn't stay latched on the Right side pops out frequently may return this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: It works great, no issues after using for 1 month.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Champion

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I buy for my mom she say very comfortable easy to fold
customer_reviews.author: Mike schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Wheel chair
customer_reviews.text: My mom is very happy with this wheel chair. I extended the foot rests and her legs are very comfortable? she is on the heavy side but with the cushion and width it is perfect for her. I would highly recommend this wheel chair especially the price and all assembled when it arrived with no shipping charge.
customer_reviews.author: Fultongirl44

customer_reviews.title: Meets my needs
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for 3 weeks now and it has become a bit wobbly. I'm sure something just needs tightening. It suits my purpose (surgery on my foot). For any longer term injury I would invest in something steadier and lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie Hudspeth

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy and the shipping very fast thank you
customer_reviews.text: Just right for my dad very light and helpful for moving around that house and taking to the doctor. I'm very happy and the shipping very fast thank you
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Mac Donald

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: Poorly built, too heavy. had it for 2 weeks, then sold it because it's too heavy to hard roll. Do not buy this,after two weeks I sold it and I only got one third of what I payed for it.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Stoll

customer_reviews.title: Would not of bought had I known how cheaply made it was
customer_reviews.text: I received the wheel chair. It's mainly made of plastic. One of the plastic clips for the leg rests was already cracked. I contacted the seller to return because it is not as sturdy as needed and a clip was cracked. It took several attempts. Finally they sent a return label where I would have to pay for shipping!!! Not happy at all!
customer_reviews.author: Michael McCardell

customer_reviews.title: Strong Wheels
customer_reviews.text: Perfect wheelchair. Strong, durable and trusted in my family. This thing was made to last and it's dependable.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Ngo

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair
customer_reviews.text: This chair is great and easy to use and set up. I am a short 5'2" woman and I use this chair for my husband. It opens and folds easily and once you find out where to grab the collapsed chair it is easy to pick up and put in and take out of the car (I have a hatchback). My husband says it is comfortable (you will need to buy a thick cushion to sit on). It rolls well. Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: StarWarsGal

product_meta.title: Drive Medical Cruiser III Light Weight Wheelchair with Various Flip Back Arm Styles and Front Rigging Options, Flip Back Removable Full Arms/Elevating Leg Rests, Black, 20 Inch
product_meta.description: The 20" Cruiser III Wheelchair with Flip Back Detachable Full Arms and Elevating Leg rests by Drive Medical has a carbon steel frame that eliminates seat guides and allows for custom back inserts and accessories. The silver vein finish is attractive and easy to maintain. The precision sealed wheel bearing, in front and rear, ensure long lasting performance and reliability, while the 8" front caster wheels provide a smooth ride over most surfaces. The dual axle and removable, flip back, full arms makes transferring easy. Comes standard with, detachable flip back full arms, elevating leg rests, black nylon upholstery, composite Mag-style wheels and push to lock wheel locks.
feature_bullets: Removable flip-back arms allow for easy transfer
Dual axle provides easy transition of seat height to hemi-level
Dimensions of the seat is 16x19x18 inches and the seat height is 18 inches

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
